title: Dan Breznitz: Innovation in the Service of Society
itunes:title: Dan Breznitz: Innovation in the Service of Society
description: Dan Breznitz, author of the book Innovation in Real Places, Strategies for Prosperity in an Unforgiving World, and professor of public policy at the University of Toronto, talks about how innovation ought to be guided if it is to be successful in addressing our most pressing problems.
content:encoded: Dan Breznitz, author of the book Innovation in Real Places, Strategies for Prosperity in an Unforgiving World, and professor of public policy at the University of Toronto, talks about how innovation ought to be guided if it is to be successful in addressing our most pressing problems.

itunes:author: Institute for New Economic Thinking (INET)
